messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Be Kind To Digest Readers
messages.msgSnippet: Tery, Sorry, I ll try harder. Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience!
messages.messageBody:
Tery,
Sorry, I'll try harder.
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!

messages.subject: Be Kind To Digest Readers
messages.msgSnippet: The following is an example of what really creates a mess for those getting the e-mails from this list in digest form.  Everything below Johanna s first
messages.messageBody:
The following is an example of what really creates a mess for those
getting the e-mails from this list in digest form. Everything below
Johanna's first message could have and should have been deleted.

Posters, please remember to cut off all the extra garbage when you
post.

Tery

Sample:

______________________________________________________________________
__
______________________________________________________________________
__

Message: 4
Date: Fri, 21 Sep 2001 23:47:14 -0400
From: "Tami Labig-Duquette" <labigduquette@...>
Subject: Re: Statistically

LOL, Yep thats me :)
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

Try out this fun site!
http://www.neopets.com/refer.phtml?username=angel1bunny
